images.description: 겨울철 건강 관리를 하는 중장년층 - 썸네일
images.imagen_prompt: A warm indoor scene of middle-aged Asian couple in their 60s doing light stretching exercise together near a window with winter scenery outside. Cozy living room with warm lighting. The couple wearing comfortable home clothes, smiling and healthy-looking. Soft natural light. Professional lifestyle photography. Warm, hopeful atmosphere.
images.alt_text: 겨울철 실내에서 가벼운 운동을 하며 건강을 관리하는 중장년층 부부

images.imagen_prompt: A clean medical infographic showing 5 major chronic diseases in winter season. Icons representing: heart (cardiovascular disease), blood sugar meter (diabetes), lungs (respiratory disease), knee joint (arthritis), and brain (stroke). Simple, modern flat design style with soft blue and warm orange colors. Icons arranged in a circular or grid layout. Labels in Korean. Professional medical infographic quality. White or light blue background.
images.alt_text: 겨울철 주의해야 할 만성질환: 심혈관질환, 당뇨병, 호흡기질환, 관절염, 뇌졸중

images.imagen_prompt: An elderly Asian person sitting at a table, measuring blood pressure with a digital blood pressure monitor at home. Blood glucose meter and health log notebook visible on the table. Warm, bright morning light through window. Clean, organized home setting. Calm, focused expression. Realistic photography style. Encouraging and responsible atmosphere.
images.alt_text: 가정에서 혈압계를 사용하여 건강을 체크하는 노년층

images.imagen_prompt: A bird's eye view of a healthy Korean winter meal on a wooden table. Dishes include: vegetable soup with cabbage and radish, steamed fish, various colorful vegetable side dishes (banchan), brown rice, and fresh fruits. Low sodium, balanced nutrition. Warm, inviting food photography. Natural daylight. Clean, fresh presentation. No processed or fried foods visible.
images.alt_text: 만성질환자를 위한 건강한 겨울철 식단: 채소 국물, 생선, 다양한 채소 반찬

images.imagen_prompt: A clean, modern checklist infographic for winter health management. Five items with checkboxes: regular health checkups (doctor icon), flu vaccination (syringe icon), emergency preparedness (phone icon), symptom monitoring (clipboard icon), and medication management (pill bottle icon). Simple flat design with soft medical blue and white colors. Icons with Korean labels. Professional healthcare poster style. Organized vertical layout.
images.alt_text: 겨울철 건강 체크리스트: 정기검진, 독감예방접종, 응급상황대비, 증상관찰, 약물관리

style_guidelines.color_palette: Warm indoor lighting tones, soft medical blues and whites, natural food colors
style_guidelines.overall_tone: Warm, encouraging, professional yet approachable, hopeful

technical_specs.aspect_ratio: 16:9 for hero image, 4:3 for section images

cultural_considerations.target_audience: Korean middle-aged and elderly population with chronic diseases
